title: TermVectorComponent NPE when use group parameter with Solr Cloud
description:
Hello,
I am getting a NPE when using the TermVectorComponent when use group parameter with SolrCloud.

My request handler:

<searchComponent name="tvComponent" class="org.apache.solr.handler.component.TermVectorComponent"/>

<requestHandler name="/tvrh" class="org.apache.solr.handler.component.SearchHandler">
        <lst name="defaults">
                <bool name="tv">true</bool>
        </lst>
        <arr name="last-components">
                <str>tvComponent</str>
        </arr>
</requestHandler>



Query:

http://localhost:8983/solr/xxxx/tvrh?q=*%3A*&group.field=_root_&group=true&group.limit=3
